msg: AMBARI-2055. Oozie reconfig forces the user to enter bogus values for two parameters in order to save any changes. (yusaku)

author: yusaku
msg: AMBARI-2054. If "Install from Local Repository" selected in install wizard, Add Host wizard not working. (yusaku)

author: yusaku
msg: AMBARI-2053. Align "add hosts" button vertically with host health filter. (yusaku)

author: rvesse
msg: Lots of improvements and bug fixes
Adds ability to have TYPE_SCROLL_INSENSITIVE result sets
Improves handling of transactions to share transactions on single threads where appropriate
Starts adding unit tests for prepared statements and executeBatch()
